item.title: Back to Maven?
item.author: Nova Annabella
item.description: Back to Maven? The markdown text is already in English, and it contains a markdown image with a hyperlink to an article titled “Moving Back from Gradle to Maven” on the website phauer.com. 10 Years of Gradle. In search of relief and a brief journey to rediscover the strength of Maven. Sorry, there is no text to translate in the given markdown code. It seems to be an empty code block.
